content:
@WG-prioritization/alerts issue #83139 has been requested for prioritization.

Procedure

  • Priority?
  • Regression?
  • Notify people/groups?
  • Needs I-nominated?
This occurs on nightly-2021-01-24 and nagisa asked the author to check with the recent nightly

I'm unclear about the stable-to-beta label.
Apparently happens also on the latest nightly (2021-03-15 as of yet). Does it make he issue a stable-to-nightly regression?

Anyway, this issue is labelled as high/critical on the reporter's end, so I'd assign a p-high accordingly.

Opinions?
on a second thought: if it's in beta, it will land in stable in a week, right? So maybe P-critical?
@WG-prioritization I'm unsure on this issue. Probably I-nominate for discussion?

apiraino said:

on a second thought: if it's in beta, it will land in stable in a week, right? So maybe P-critical?

I would assign P-critical.
I will set it to critical out of caution to get the attention on it and decide about being a release blocker. There is an LLVM patch which might solve the issue. Let's see how it turns out
